title: Even radical index
text: Since the radical index is $$2$$, it is even, so, the radicand must be greater than or equal to $$0$$.

title: Solving the Radicand
text: We need $$\frac{6}{x+3} \geq 0$$. The denominator can not be zero. Since the numerator is positive and we only need to ensure the denominator is positive. Solve $$x+3>0$$.

title: Solve the Inequality
text: Subtract $$3$$ to both sides of the inequality and get $$x>-3$$.

title: Find the domain
text: We can turn $$x>-3$$ into interval notation as $$(-3,\infty)$$.
